mapper.select: /*jobFairBooth.selectJobFairBooth*/ SELECT BOOTH_SEQ , FAIR_SEQ , COMPNY_INSTT_SEQ , COMPNY_INSTT_DIV_CD , BOOTH_NM , BOOTH_FEE , BOOTH_REQ_DT , BOOTH_CANCEL_REQ_DT , BOOTH_STS_CD , USE_YN , JC_CD , JC_USER_SEQ , REG_USER_SEQ , REG_DT FROM CPES_FAIR_BOOTH WHERE FAIR_SEQ = #{fairSeq} AND BOOTH_SEQ = #{boothSeq} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/*jobFairBooth.selectJobFairBoothList*/ SELECT A.BOOTH_SEQ , A.FAIR_SEQ , A.COMPNY_INSTT_SEQ , A.COMPNY_INSTT_DIV_CD , A.BOOTH_NM , A.BOOTH_FEE , A.BOOTH_REQ_DT , A.BOOTH_CANCEL_REQ_DT , A.BOOTH_STS_CD , A.USE_YN , A.JC_CD , A.JC_USER_SEQ , A.REG_USER_SEQ , A.REG_DT , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('BOOTH_STS_CD', A.BOOTH_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS BOOTH_STS_NM FROM CPES_FAIR_BOOTH A WHERE A.FAIR_SEQ = #{fairSeq} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
